Sentencas: The coefficients of diffusion and surface exchange (D and k, respectively) are critically important parameters to determine the ability of a material to perform well within solid state electrochemical systems.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: For oxide materials operating as components within solid oxide fuel cells or other oxygen ion-based devices, the oxygen self diffusion and surface exchange are often measured using an isotopic tracer.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: Recently, there has been concern regarding the ability of this technique to measure k with high precision when thick ceramic samples are measured.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: Here, we show that isotope exchange with thin film samples can lead to an increased range of experimental conditions where k can be precisely determined.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: Thin samples require a more generalized solution to the diffusion equation than typically used in order to understand the ionic motion within the material.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: Through numerical analysis of the more complex analytical model that results, we describe conditions when k and/or D can be measured using both thin film and traditional samples.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: Further, we derive characteristic parameters related to the exchange time (t), material thickness (I), D, and k that can be used to quantify these conditions.
Titulo: Measurability of the diffusion and surface exchange coefficients using isotope exchange with thin film and traditional samples

Sentencas: Of particular interest is that traditional isotope exchange experimentation can be used to robustly determine k even in situations where l >> D/k so long as 5 .
